metadata.title: CVE-2022-2908 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A potential DoS vulnerability was discovered in Gitlab CE/EE versionsstarting from 10.7 before 15.1.5, all versions starting from 15.2 before15.2.3, all versions starting from 15.3 before 15.3.1 allowed an attackerto trigger high CPU usage via a special crafted input added in the Commitmessage field.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
